ICS 1C text books available in the UCI Bookstore

  • To: Multiple recipients of list <ics1c@UCI.EDU>
  • Subject: ICS 1C text books available in the UCI Bookstore
  • From: ICS 1C Instructional Staff <ics1c@ics.uci.edu>
  • Date: Sat, 14 Jan 1995 17:36:01 -0800 
Copies of the text for ICS IC
    "The World Wide Web Unleashed," by
    John December and Neil Randall, 1994,
    Sams Publishing (Indianapolis, Indiana, USA),
    ISBN 0-672-30617-4.
are again available in the UCI Bookstore.
When I checked early Saturday afternoon, there were on the shelf 
in the textbook section about 15 of the supplementary order of 20.
(The initial order of 30 matched the original enrollment limit of
the class.)
-- sdf
Stephen Franklin
ICS 1C Instructor

  • Index: Mail Index
